column1: 13893596$Exodius the Ultimate Forbidden Lord$Unlimited$DARK$[Spellcaster/Effect]$$$$$10$?$0$$$$Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) by shuffling all monsters in your Graveyard into the Deck
column2: and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. When this card declares an attack: Send 1 monster from your hand or Deck to the Graveyard. This card gains 1000 ATK for each Normal Monster in your Graveyard. If this face-up card would leave the field
column3: banish it instead. If there are 5 different "Forbidden One" cards in your Graveyard that were sent there by this card's effect
column4: you win the Duel.$Supports archetypes /Forbidden One$$Returns from Graveyard to Deck for cost/Returns from your Graveyard to your Deck/Activates upon attack declaration/Sends from your hand to your Graveyard/Sends from your Deck to your Graveyard$Summon/Trigger/Continuous/Unclassified/Condition$
